alert.note: Alert for Woods (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 02 at 12:57PM CDT until June 02 at 1:45PM CDT by NWS Norman-Oklahoma City
info.description: The National Weather Service in Norman has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern Woods County in northwestern Oklahoma... * Until 145 PM CDT. * At 1257 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Avard, moving north at 10 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Alva, Avard, Capron, and Hopeton. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
